Warning: Resistivity values do not match
Warning: Resistivity values do not match

The resistivity values in the Excel spreadsheets are not equal. This may mean the results are not from the same sample or it was entered incorrectly in the spreadsheet. Please correct this before continuing as the theoretical crossover point value will be based upon the value in the "Before illumination" spreadsheet.

Error: Fit could not be produced
There was an error producing the fit, this may be because the data is not good enough, i.e. if the lifetime does not increase with injection level. Do not attempt to plot an Individual C values plot!
